videos.headline: Toledo QB calls his own number for a 70-yard TD
videos.description: Dequan Finn takes the QB draw 70 yards for a Toledo touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Toledo QB calls his own number for a 70-yard TD) 2021/09/25
